com.pb.sawdust.util

Class Caster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.util.Caster

  • public class Caster
extends java.lang.Object
    The Caster class provides convenience methods for casting between various types, primarily primitives.

      • castToBoolean

        public static boolean castToBoolean(byte value)
        Cast a value to a boolean. Unless the value is zero, this method returns true.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to cast.
        Returns:
        true if value is numerically true, false otherwise.
